name: The Founders Hive
tag_list: startups, co-founders, shoreditch, london, entrepreneurs-angel-investors, vc
description: SIMPLIFYING THE SEARCH FOR YOUR CO-FOUND
overview:
The Founders’ Hive is a PEER-TO-PEER STARTUP BUSINESS INCUBATOR for high-growth, high-impact businesses. We are a unique global platform that brings together entrepreneurs, startup enthusiasts, executives, non-executive directors, angel investors, innovators, and venture capitalists.
With our support, the Founders’ Hive community is better able to collaborate, listen, share and learn - and as result inspire each other to transform ideas into viable and profitable businesses. The Founders Hive assists in matching the skills of individuals across diverse industries to build and support startup teams at any stage of development. Our goal is to simplify the traditional routes of business development. By turning the “founding cycle” into a collaborative process, entrepreneurs are able to acquire everything needed to launch a new business while saving both time and money.
